title: Didn't receive the world's pick em icon for earning 34 points
body: It says that players will receive the world's pick em icon by earning 34 points, but it's been over 3 days and I've not received it?

replies.body: Me too. I have about 80 and haven received it.

I do see you received one poro icon so far, but unfortunately I'm unable to verify the points you've received so far.  Send us a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look into this for you.  Grab a screenshot of your points on the site, and make sure to include the top right section that shows you're logged into the correct account.  We'll see what we can do!
